addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Switch: Click here to switch to the 'add assembly' or 'convert part to assembly' form.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_PartNumber: Choose your part number from the dropdown.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_BOMNumber: Enter your bill of materials (BOM) number.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_AssemblyPartName: Enter the name of your assembly part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Description: Provide a description for your assembly part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_RevisionNumber: Enter the revision number for your assembly part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_DrawingNumber: Enter the drawing number for your assembly part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_ProductGroup_container: Select the product (code) from the dropdown.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_TechnologyId_container: Select the technology from the dropdown.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_EffectiveDate: Select the effective date for your assembly part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Edit_EffectiveDate: Update the effective date for your assembly part.
addAssemblyPart.AssemblyPart_Add_BOM: Click here to add more child parts.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Remark: Add any necessary remarks for your assembly part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_UploadFiles: Attach any necessary files for your assembly part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Save: Click here to save your assembly part information.

addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_PartName: Enter the name of your component part.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_Description: Provide a description for your component part.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_ProductGroup_container: Select the product (code) from the dropdown.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_RevisionNumber: Enter the revision number for your component part.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_DrawingNumber: Enter the drawing number for your component part.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_TechnologyId_container: Select the technology from the dropdown.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_EffectiveDate: Select the effective date for your component part.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_Edit_EffectiveDate: Update the effective date for your component part.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_Remark: Add any necessary remarks for your component part.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_UploadFiles: Attach any necessary files for your component part.
addComponentPart.AddIndivisualPart_Save: Click here to save your component part information.

addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_description: Provide a description for your product.
addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_RevisionNumber: Enter the revision number for your product.
addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_DrawingNumber: Enter the drawing number for your product.
addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_EffectiveDate: Select the effective date for your product.
addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_Edit_EffectiveDate: Update the effective date for your product.
addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_IsImpactCalculation_co: Select check box to see volume impact in FG wise specific to the chosen product number.
addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_Remark: Add any necessary remarks for your product.
addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_UploadFiles: Attach any necessary files for your product.
addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_Save: Click here to save your product information.
